goal.core.mentalstate

Enum BASETYPE

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<BASETYPE>
      • goal.core.mentalstate.BASETYPE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BASETYPE>

    public enum BASETYPE
extends java.lang.Enum<BASETYPE>

    Different (data)base types that are used in GOAL.

    These types are useful for differentiating databases in the KR layer.

    Author:
    K.Hindriks

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BELIEFBASE
      database storing data from the belief section, and insert()'ed objects.
      GOALBASE
      database storing a single goal, either a single line from a goal section or from single adopt() actions.
      KNOWLEDGEBASE
      A knowledge base.
      MAILBOX
      Database storing mails.
      PERCEPTBASE
      Database storing percepts.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • KNOWLEDGEBASE

        public static final BASETYPE KNOWLEDGEBASE
        A knowledge base. Note that GOAL does not explicitly store the knowledge base of an agent, but only a list of formulae in the KB, present in the agent's GOALProgram. This value is mostly there so that the DatabasePanel can identify that it contains information of the knowledge base.

      • BELIEFBASE

        public static final BASETYPE BELIEFBASE
        database storing data from the belief section, and insert()'ed objects. There is only 1 beliefbase for an agent. Beliefbase automatically inherits the Knowledge base.

      • GOALBASE

        public static final BASETYPE GOALBASE
        database storing a single goal, either a single line from a goal section or from single adopt() actions. Goal bases automatically inherit the knowledge base; Note that this feature is implemented by the KR layer.

      • MAILBOX

        public static final BASETYPE MAILBOX
        Database storing mails.

      • PERCEPTBASE

        public static final BASETYPE PERCEPTBASE
        Database storing percepts.

    System.out.println(c);
